title: [Large-Scale] Online Information Literacy Education for Professional Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and general workplace information application experience
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to efficiently collect, evaluate, and utilize information in work and daily life. Provides mobile-optimized content considering PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify reliable information from various online sources with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain at least three strategies for systematically searching and evaluating information required in work environments.
Learners acquire critical thinking skills to distinguish fake news and disinformation with 90% accuracy.
Learners can apply methods to respond to information privacy and security threats in real-world scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
